name: 3D Monster Maze VR (beta)
description:
You have been plunged into a dark maze.  A monster roams it, and you must try and escape before it finds you.  Good luck!

This was developed on an Oculus Quest 2.  Please let me know how you find the game or if you have any problems or suggestions.

Updates:

11/6/2022 - There is now a choice of different sized mazes.

Credits:

Original game design and graphics by Malcolm Evans.
